text: Seems like Apple M1s swap extremely aggressively... <https://twitter.com/marcan42/status/1361151198921826308>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/marcan42|@marcan42>: People with an M1 mac, please run `brew install smartmontools && sudo smartctl --all /dev/disk0` and report back (and what kind of usage you make of the machine, especially RAM).

I'm at <600GBW on my MBP, but I don't use it heavily. <https://twitter.com/never_released/status/1360657594197671941>

<https://twitter.com/never_released|@never_released>: M1 Mac SSD update…

Apple, this is NOT okay. Especially as the internal SSD isn’t replaceable. The machine is just a bit over 2 months old. <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EuIG3h9XcAgf_87.jpg>

text: ..... great! my 2014 MBP finally stopped working so ordered the new M1 MBP that is arriving today (snow storm dependent)
